entry.title: Fixing a broken Octopress install
entry.content:
CONFIGURE_OPTS="--with-iconv-dir=/usr/bin" rbenv install 1.9.3-p448

gem 'pygments.rb', '~> 0.3.0'

/home/sircharles/.rbenv/versions/1.9.3-p448/lib/ruby/1.9.1/psych.rb:203:in `parse': (): did not find expected key while parsing a block mapping at line 2 column 1 (Psych::SyntaxError)

/home/sircharles/.rbenv/versions/2.0.0-p247/lib/ruby/gems/2.0.0/gems/maruku-0.6.0/lib/maruku/input/parse_doc.rb:22:in `require': cannot load such file -- iconv (LoadError)
